long.title: 第255期 Listening practice | For those who truly want to work on their listening skills
answer: It’s a great way to make three hundred bucks (=dollars).
But it’s a great way to pay the bills. So…
I’m just doing some breathing exercises. I teach them to (/tə/) all my clients. It’s a great way to let go of some anxiety.
I like riding (weak sound) the 10-speed because it’s fun, uh, gives you energy, and it’s a great way to stay in shape.

answer: What is it exactly that you want?

answer: What exactly is it that you want? Mr.Tribbles?

answer: What exactly is it that she needs?
